replies.bodyText:
Yeah, generally this is a callback that is driven from the ViewModel.

  
    
      android/src/main/java/com/nextcloud/client/etm/EtmActivity.kt
    
    
        Lines 54 to 56
      in
      bc0b9e7
    
    
    
    

        
          
           vm.currentPage.observe(this, Observer { 
        

        
          
               onPageChanged(it) 
        

        
          
           }) 
        
    
  


So, by calling it outside VM, the UI is no longer in sync with view model.
The proper way to do it is to initiate the page change via EtmViewModel.onPageSelected(pageIndex: Int) API, which is wired to a list item tap event. By calling it you "simulate" user tapping the list item and everything will stay in sync.
